title: ils插件报错
author: huiyi10
txt_content:
ils插件添加标签包括使用就出现这个An internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command
求大佬解答，下面的是具体情况


[20:47:01 INFO]: Item Lore Stats commands:
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils reload
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils stats
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils version
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils name <text>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils lore <player_name> <line#> <text>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils give <player_name> <item_name>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils give <player_name> <item_name>, <new_item_name>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils custom tool <Item Type Name>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils custom armour helmet/chest/legs/boots <Item Type Name>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils repair
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils upgrade hand
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils upgrade armour
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils upgrade all
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils combatLog
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils sell
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils export <item_name>
[20:47:01 INFO]: /ils setMultiplier
[20:47:04 WARN]: java.lang.NullPointerException

[20:47:04 WARN]: at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.DedicatedServer.aB(DedicatedServer.java:326)
[20:47:04 WARN]: at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R4.DedicatedServer.v(DedicatedServer.java:290)

replies.author: 十年后？
replies.txt_content: 无大碍吧 没蹦服的话 可以直接无视
